name: Dice Valley
description:
Dice themed puzzle game where you build your way to the goal!

Summary

Move your dice to the goal the win!

As you roll the dice, the platform behind you will rise according to the dice's number.

Be careful not to get stuck, because you can only climb up to one floor higher ;)

Controls

  • Movement = Up, Left, Down, Right  / W,A,S,D
  • Restart = R

Created by Team Hideout

  • Game Designer : giraffeStar
  • Artist : excalet007
  • Lead Programmer : RhyBad (@rhybad)
  • Programmer : sizrit
